Hej

I’m a digital and analog designer based in Hamburg. Currently Junior Product Designer at digital agency SinnerSchrader, fascinated to learn about a dozen subjects of design craftsmenship, with a great passion for lettering. My guilty pleasure is hoarding tons of art supplies and getting my hands dirty with ink.

Besides my work at SinnerSchrader, I am available for interesting side projects. Feel free to contact me. Also visit my Dribbbleand Instagram.
